caption.title: Ordination diagram of populations of Impatiens capensis Meerb.
caption.p: (Aâ€“H) Seed biometric traits (dotted gray arrows) and environmental variables (solid black arrows) along the first two RDA axes. * Statistically significant variables; Anthrop, anthropogenic disturbances; shadow, degree of shading. For codes of populations and soil properties see Tables 1 and 6, respectively.
